scripts.electron:build-main: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && mv dist-electron/main.js dist-electron/main.cjs 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.electron:build-preload: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && mv dist-electron/preload.js dist-electron/preload.cjs 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.electron:dev: npm run electron:build-main && npm run electron:build-preload && concurrently "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && npm run electron:build-main && npm run electron:build-preload && electron-builder
scripts.electron:pack: npm run build && npm run electron:build-main && npm run electron:build-preload && electron-builder --dir
